name: Shines Over II Halloween
description:
> FREE Spin-off / Halloween 2020

> First Person Horror Game

> Windows x86 / x64

> Language: English

INSTALATION:

NOTE:

Some virus scanner could find some problems with the .exe of the game. It's a false positive, but if you have this issue:

> Download "SO2HE_original.exe" and put it on the main folder.

> Lauch the game from this executable.
